name: tsan3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))
-| wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))
-| wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w1), wn(wa(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))
-| wi(wn(w1), wn(wa(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w1), wn(wa(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wo(wn(w2), wn(w1)), wn(wa(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w2, w1))))
-| wi(wo(wn(w2), wn(w1)), wn(wa(w2, w1)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical conjunction, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
